actions.name: Activate
actions.description: Power up the weapon for a stronger attack.

actions.name: Defensive Stance
actions.description: Plant the Slab Shield into the ground and enter a defensive stance, capable of withstanding all but the strongest attacks.

actions.name: Parry
actions.description: Parry an incoming attack and perform a fast, deadly counter.

actions.name: Punch
actions.description: A quick stab that inflics low damage but ignores Stagger reduction. A good combo starter.

actions.name: Special Melee Attack
actions.description: A special attack that usually inflicts a certain type of damage. This differs between weapons that have this as their special action, however.

actions.name: Warp Charged
actions.description: Power the weapon up for a stronger attack.
